name: lswarm Union (v1)
text:
Send one "lswarm" monster from your hand and one "Iswarm" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard and add 1 "Iswarm" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only Special Summon "Iswarm" monsters while you are using this Skill (excluding Special Summons from your Extra Deck).
You can only use this Skill once in a Duel if you have 10 or more "Iswarm" monsters in your Deck (excluding your Extra Deck) when you start the Duel.
